trans-unit.source: Dynamically hit tests a stroke with an eraser path.
trans-unit.target: Sottopone dinamicamente a hit testing un tratto con il tracciato della gomma da cancellare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> hit tests strokes by determining when a eraser path intersects that stroke.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> hit test tratti da determinare quando un percorso di gomma interseca il tratto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.AddPoints%2A> method in the stylus events to add the points to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.AddPoints%2A> metodo negli eventi dello stilo per aggiungere i punti di <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>.

trans-unit.source: When the points added to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> intersect a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando i punti aggiunti per il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> si intersecano una <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> genera il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> evento.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to dynamically erase a portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio riportato di seguito viene illustrato come cancellare dinamicamente una parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Per creare un controllo che consente di cancellare l'input penna, vedere [come: cancellare input penna su un controllo personalizzato](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester" /> intersects an ink <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester" /> interseca un'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> dell'input penna.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to dynamically erase a portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio riportato di seguito viene illustrato come cancellare dinamicamente una parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Per creare un controllo che consente di cancellare l'input penna, vedere [come: cancellare input penna su un controllo personalizzato](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
